It uses a sparse gaussian processto produce a differntiable density function that can be evaluated out of sample.Installation============To install Mellon using **pip** you can run:.. code-block:: bash pip install mellonor to install using **conda** you can run:.. code-block:: bash conda install -c conda-forge mellonor to install using **mamba** you can run:.. code-block:: bash mamba install -c conda-forge mellonDocumentation=============Please read the`documentation <https://mellon.readthedocs.io/en/latest/index.html>`_or use this`basic tutorial notebook <https://github.com/settylab/Mellon/blob/main/notebooks/basic_tutorial.ipynb>`_.Basic Usage===========.. code-block:: python import mellon import numpy as np X = np.random.rand(100, 10) # 10-dimensional state representation for 100 cells Y = np.random.rand(100, 10) # arbitrary test data model = mellon.DensityEstimator() log_density_x = model.fit_predict(X) log_density_y = model.predict(Y)
